## Emergency tips
- DMF technique by Nick Goldsmith (former Royal Marine Commando with PTSD)
  - Distract (go for walk)
  - Music (listen to nature)
  - Food (get something good into your stomach)
- Pillars of mental health
  i) sleep
  ii) good nutrition
  iii) exercise
  iv) socialising in a safe way
- THINK before you speak
  - Is it True?
  - Is it Helpful?
  - Is it Important?
  - Is it Necessary?
  - Is it Kind?
